A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly A Disappointment\, Only 2 Good Scenes (Throne Room Battle\, Hyperspace Kamikaze Scene) Throughout The Film. They Degraded The Legacy Of The Skywalkers\, Destroyed Everything Starwars Stood For\, Destroyed Everything Like Stood For\, And There Wasn’t Even A Lighstaber Clash. Also\, How Dare They Throw Away All The Interesting Subplots From The Force Awakens After Teasing Us For 3 Years. As A Fan Of Star Wars I’m Very Let Down.
